Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards

Class SetItemCountObjective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.Objective
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.CountObjective
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.SetItemCountObjective
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SetItemCountObjective extends CountObjective
Model implementation of a specific type of Condition/Objective that requires to count the number of sets of different Resource items inside the Corners of the Cards inside the Play Area that are visible.

  • Constructor Details

    • SetItemCountObjective

      public SetItemCountObjective(int points, int number, String name, String description)
      Constructor Method.
      Parameters:
      points - : the number of points the Condition gives every time it's satisfied.
      number - : the number of Corners that need to be counted to satisfy the Condition once.
      description - : a String containing the Description of the Objective, displayed in the GUI.
